overview_of_class: This workshop convenes two or three times per quarter for PhD students in US history and the instructor to read, critique and discuss drafts of dissertation chapters, scholarly articles, papers for conference presentation, and other professional materials.  Its goals are to speed students' progress, improve their work, enhance their skills in explaining their work and commenting on others' work, and provide them a supportive community.
name: Divisional Seminar in American History
subject: HISTORY
